member.name: ISpatialAudioObjectForMetadataItems.GetSpatialAudioMetadataItems
member.summary: Gets a pointer to the object which stores metadata items for the .
member.param: Receives a pointer to the associated with the .

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, possible return codes include, but are not limited to, the values shown in the following table.

summary.para: Used to write spatial audio metadata for applications that require multiple metadata items per buffer with frame-accurate placement. The data written via this interface must adhere to the format defined by the metadata format specified in the when the was created.
This interface is a part of Windows Sonic, Microsoft’s audio platform for more immersive audio which includes integrated spatial sound on Xbox and Windows.
